mods.name: Simple Voice Chat
mods.description_en: Adds Voice Chat to Minecraft. Especially recommended for events.

mods.name: Sodium
mods.description_en: Improves performance. It works similar to Optifine.

mods.name: Iris Shaders
mods.description_en: A modern shader pack loader for Minecraft intended to be compatible with existing OptiFine shader packs.

mods.name: Fabric API
mods.description_en: Many other Fabric mods require Fabric API to work.

mods.name: No Chat Reports
mods.description_en: Disables chat reporting, fixes misleading error messages and turns off telemetry.

mods.name: Mod Menu
mods.description_en: Adds a menu which shows what mods are installed.
